title: Open Concept - Two Bedroom, One Bath
posting_body: Living space:
Spacious with Laminate dark hardwood floors.
Recess lighting with updated LED Fixtures for energy conserving.
Dining Room: Great space with a window that lets in lots of light.
Kitchen: Caesar stone counters (White), and lots of cabinetry with self-closing mechanisms.
Stainless steel appliances.
Dishwasher included!
Bathroom: Craftsman tile work throughout.
Very Bright space.
Heater and motion sensor fan.
Bedrooms: Low profile carpet, with abundant closet space.
Laundry Room: Compact stackable Washer and Dryer.
Location Offers:
Paved trail Across Lake Washington
Park Directly behind our building
Close to five nearby parks for sports tennis & basketball courts, dog park, water park
Close to Seattle's downtown stores and nightlife
One mile from downtown and hospitals Swedish, Providence, Virginia Mason, Harborview
Bike Path To Sound Trail: Ride to Seattle, Bellevue or Mercer Island Close to Seahawks and Mariner Games
Bus Lines: 14 off of Jackson and 23rd- International district, downtown.
27 off Yesler and 22nd- Downtown, First Hill, Capitol Hill, University District
Easy access to I-5 and I-90.
